header_text: You have to give a presentation for your coworkers today. When you stand up in front of your colleagues, you feel your cheeks get hot and your hands start to tremble. You think that these sensations will be manageable.

elements.Text: Can you handle your anxiety symptoms while you give your presentation?

elements.name: You have to give a presentation for your coworkers today. When you stand up in front of your colleagues, you feel your cheeks get hot and your hands start to tremble. You think that these sensations will be manageable._Social Situations_comp_question
